I'm afraid that it won't work. ```dpkg-buildpackage``` will run install command using a dh_auto_install with a ```--destdir``` (pointing to debian/drcsim) so the path using ```CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX``` it is not enough. You could modify to include```ENV${DESTDIR}``` before ```CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX``` ... but that also won't work since cmake will expand variables during the phase previous to compilation and instalation when you know nothing about the ```DESTDIR``.

I'm still looking for a proper solution. As a workaround we can generate the symlinks in debian/rules. It is not very nice, but will work.
